TitleEnglish: The Garden of Sinners: A Study in Murder - Part 1
SummaryEnglish: August 1995: Mikiya first meets Shiki in a white kimono during a snowing day. Later on, at the high school freshmen ceremony, Mikiya sees Shiki in the crowd and chases after her, introducing himself to her. But Shiki hides a big secret: A wave of bizarre murders occur around many loose ends, and no suspects. there are still many questions: Who to believe? Who is the murderer? What is the secret of Shiki? and especially: Who is SHIKI?

The Garden of Sinners - Chapter 2: A Study in Murder (Part 1)
Kara no Kyoukai: The Garden of Sinners, A Study in Murder: Part 1
